name: BGSjam5 Game Pack
description:
Check out the games made for BGSjam5, the fifth official game jam of Buffalo Game Space! This pack contains six games made by the incredibly talented game development community of Western New York in 48 hours based on the theme "Nightmares".

Claustro Maze
  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Mouse Click - Turn lights on/off
Feuerstein
  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • Mouse - Look
Forever Stupid
  • A/D - Move
Futch's Nightmare
  • A/D - Move
  • Space - Jump
The Long Hellway
  • Arrows - Move
  • Left CTRL - Jump
Nora Nightlight
  • Arrows - Move
  • Left CTRL - Jump
  • Left Shift - Blankie whip
  • Left ALT - Hide under blankie
  • Space bar - Parachute
Peter Pantsless
  • A/D/Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Step
  • S/Down Arrow - Duck

Keep in mind that since these are jam games, you might find some occasional bugs here and there.
